html:
The equity prices of Lafarge Africa Plc and Airtel Africa Plc were adjusted for dividends as recommended by their respective Boards of Directors as shown in the table below:


S/N 	Security 	              Closure Date      Last Close Price      Dividend 	Bonus 	Ex-div Price
1 	Lafarge Africa Plc	11/11/2021	N25.85	           N1.00	Nil	N24.85
2 	Airtel Africa Plc	11/11/2021	N880.00	           N8.29	Nil	N871.71


The equity price of Airtel Africa Plc was rounded down to N871.70 in conformity with the price step methodology.
